commit.message: Added ability to specify runtime for localrunner

nodes.bodyText: I don't think it makes sense to default to thread runtime especially when users can run functions in python which must be in process runtime.  The default should just be null.  In LocalRunner, if Java is used the default is thread runtime anyways.
